info.title: HubSpot Settings V2
info.description: HubSpot Settings allows you to retrieve information about a given HubSpot account, including the account settings, account activity, business units, and managing users.

get.description: Get login activity for a HubSpot account.
Get security activity for a HubSpot account
Get the daily API usage and limits for a HubSpot account.
Get account details for a HubSpot account.

get.summary: Get business units for a user
get.description: Get business Units identified by `userId`. The `userId` refers to the user's ID.
Retrieve the details for the teams of this account.
Retrieves the roles on an account.
Retrieves a list of users from an account.

post.description: Adds a new user. New users will only have minimal permissions, which is contacts-base. A welcome email will prompt them to set a password and log in to HubSpot.

get.description: Retrieves a user identified by `userId`. `userId` refers to the user's ID by default, or optionally email as specified by the `IdProperty` query param.

delete.description: Removes a user identified by `userId`. `userId` refers to the user's ID by default, or optionally email as specified by the `IdProperty` query param.

put.description: Modifies a user identified by `userId`. `userId` refers to the user's ID by default, or optionally email as specified by the `IdProperty` query param.

x-ms-openai-manifest.modelDescription: This is a Copilot plugin to manage settings for the HubSpot service.
